Text: FW New Account ApplicationOriginal Message From Avon Michele Sent Friday July AM To Subject New Account Application This will provide the information required to open a corporate account with Tiffany Co Please complete the attached form and fax it directly to our Corporate Credit Services department at for processing We suggest that you contact your bank to advise them of your application as this will expedite their response to our request for references Thank you for your interest in Tiffany Co Corporate Sales We look forward to working with you on your business gift and award needs Should you have any questions I can be reached at select option BD Appxls Michele G Avon Business Development Representative Tiffany Co Phone x Fax To place an order call
